name: KnightNurse
description:
Dear diary,

It's rubbish here.

People are getting ill, so we have to stay inside which is very boring!

Mummy is busy at the hospital, so I have to stay home with Granny.

Mummy seems very tired when she gets home, it must be hard looking after so many patients.

Granny said I should write a story to cheer her up...

 

Once upon a time, there lived a brave and noble hero, the Knight Nurse.

 

[PROTOTYPE - MAY NOT BE REPRESENTATIVE OF FINAL PRODUCT]

 

KnightNurse is a top-down twin stick hack n' slash adventure game inspired by current events, seen through the eyes of an child.

Control the Knight Nurse as she slashes, dashes and bashes across desks, kitchen tables and sofas to save the people from a terrible curse.

Face enemies like the shuffling Lurcher, the acrobatic Sprinkler and the hulking Brawler, all leading up to the source of the evil sweeping the land.

 

CONTROLS:
Movement - WASD
Aim - Mouse
Attack - Left Click
Block - F
Dash - Spacebar
